title: grancampion_store
nomap: As an indentured servant, your options for exploration are limited. You'll have to walk on foot.
subheader: The beginnings of a proper merchant shop is being constructed here. It is crowded with colourful bottles and vials, each releasing its own enticing aroma. Customers come frequently for perfumes and other scents. A small living space occupies the area above the store. [All content here contributed by Reese Ikena]

events.title: Return to the Workhouse
events.subtitle: Go back to the drudgery of life in Gran Campion.

success.text: You head back to the wet, cold and miserable squalor of the workhouse.

events.title: Smell Everett’s Paws
events.subtitle: All of Everett’s body appeals to you, but when he crosses his legs, turning one foot towards you, his pawpads become visible. You smell the air and catch a whiff of the dirt, sweat and musk. You want to get closer and stick your nose in it. Maybe Everett would like that?

fail.text:
Everett sees you approaching, eyes focused on his exposed paw. He flexes his toes, seeming to beckon you over. You get down on all fours, grip his foot and press your nose up against his soft pads. You take a deep breath. You smell the sweat on the skunk’s feet. You smell the musky scent he produces. You smell the dirt of the roads he’s travelled. Everett presses his paw further into your nose like a soft embrace.

Instinctually you begin licking at the bottom of his foot. You want to taste what you’ve been smelling for the last few minutes. events.title: A Familiar Perfume
events.subtitle: Everett is placing more vials on the counter to replace the ones he’s sold. He uncorks one bottle to take a deep breath before placing it. As the smell wafts over to you, you remember the strong, musky scent. It’s the very same scent that the skunk produces on a daily basis. You want to smell that scent wherever you go. Perhaps drinking that perfume would help?

mikhailsex.text:
You rush to the counter and pick up the vial of musk. Everett tries to stop you at first. “That’s valuable merchandise! You can’t just-” Without hesitation, you uncork the bottle and press it up against your nose, breathing in the scent. You were right, it was the skunk’s own odour. Everett watches you obsess over the aroma. He smiles, saying, “I guess it’s alright, since it’s you. Drink up, hun. Then you can have as much as you want.”

You don’t need to be told twice. After taking one last deep breath, you pour the liquid into your mouth. It tastes salty and stings a bit, but you enjoy every flavour. With the musk inside you, all you can breathe is the strong stench. You swallow and instantly feel something tingle along your spine. Your tailbone stretches into a long tail and grows long, black fur with a white stripe down the middle. You feel something new by your tailhole, a kind of muscle. When you flex it, you feel a gas get pushed out. You smell it as it billows out from under your tail. The musky odour is just like the one Everett produces. Smelling it coming from your own body makes you shake with pleasure.

The changes spread as black fur continues to sprout all over your body. Pink pawpads emerge from your hands and feet. Once you notice, you begin licking them while still breathing in your musk. As you press into them, your face extends into a full muzzle, your pink button nose perceiving all the smells around you with more sensitivity. Everett tries to get your attention. Customers are standing by, having seen your transformation and watching in awe as you furiously lick your paws and breathe your scent. They turn towards Everett, clamoring to buy his perfumes after seeing one in action. Once they leave, Everett finally snaps you back to reality. “Nice job there, hun. We’ll have to get you to advertise my perfumes more often!”
mikhailsex.descriptionchange: This adventurer is a furry black skunk, scented faintly of an odd musky perfume that flows around when they wave their enormous striped tail.

events.title: Testing the Product
events.subtitle: Everett doesn’t test all of his perfumes. He claims that he can’t risk changing himself or it will ruin the branding of his new store. However, as an outsider, you don’t have any sort of reputation to worry about. Will you try one of the skunk’s various perfumes for him?

x1.text:
You volunteer to try one of Everett’s new perfumes. He looks at you for a few seconds with what appears to be gentle concern but relents and hands you a vial.

The contents are a vibrant pink. When you take the vial and uncork it beneath your nose, you inhale and immediately sneeze, dropping the bottle. You feel like you just tried to breathe glitter. As you recover, you get a whiff of what smells like wet feathers, pond water and shrimp. You look down and realize the vial broke when it hit the ground, spilling the liquid on your feet. “Please be more careful with the merchandise,” Everett comments.

You don’t hear him, though. You’re too busy looking down. The wetted areas on your feet have started developing tight scales. The scales continue to build up on your toes and legs. You grow sharp talons and an extra toe on your heel. Once the scales get to your thighs, they stop. Instead, bright pink feathers sprout from your skin. They begin popping out faster and faster, thickening your thighs. You gasp as tail feathers push out above your rear. They don’t stop emerging, continuing up your torso. Once your arms begin sprouting feathers, they extend, and your fingers stretch out. Soon enough you have two large wings.

Finally, the changes reach your neck. You feel it lengthening and growing new joints. Your ears merge into your head. Your nose and mouth are pushed out into a long, curved beak. Once the changes are complete, you observe your new pink body with interest. Everett studies you from behind the counter. “An avian, huh? Well, hun, good luck. I doubt you’ll get far around here looking like that,” he says. Despite his words of warning, you can’t help but admire yourself in the mirror. You might be the flashiest, prettiest person in the world.
x1.descriptionchange: This adventurer is a vibrant pink flamingo with large wings, a long beak and a taste for shrimp.

x2.text:
You volunteer to try one of Everett’s new perfumes. He looks at you for a few seconds with what appears to be gentle concern but relents and hands you a vial.

The contents are a yellow green. You take the vial from Everett’s paws, uncork it, and take a deep breath. The scent reminds you of freshly buttered popcorn. You smile and drink the entire bottleful. In your mouth, the perfume maintains the popcorn flavour but with a hint of sourness. You swish it in your mouth before downing it.

The changes start in your face. Your nose and mouth push out into a short muzzle with long white whiskers. Your eyes turn a light brown and you grow brown fur. Large tufts sprout behind your ears. The fur continues to spread. Once it reaches your back, the color changes to a coffee brown and grows longer than on your face. Your arms become thicker and fattier and your fingers turn into stubby paws with short claws. Once the area between your legs becomes covered, you feel new glands open up and instinctually release a smell just like the perfume you just drank.

You submit to the pleasure of the buttery smell as a long, prehensile tail extends from your spine and curls up at the end, covered with dark fur. Your legs shorten and grow thicker. Your belly also bulges a little bit with some extra weight. With the changes finally complete, you run a finger along you scent glands, causing a shiver to go down your spine. Everett looks at you from behind the counter and smirks. “Gehehe… not a skunk, but just as obsessed with your own musk. I think this perfume will be quite popular,” he says.
x2.descriptionchange: This adventurer is a chubby binturong with stubby paws, a long tail and a love for their own musky smell.

x3.text:
You volunteer to try one of Everett’s new perfumes. He looks at you for a few seconds with what appears to be gentle concern but relents and hands you a vial.

Unlike most of the skunk’s perfumes, this one is not liquid. Instead, it is a smoky magenta gas. When you uncork the vial, all of the smoke rushes into your nostrils. You are stunned as the smell fills your sinuses and lungs. The harsh smoky scent makes it feel like a campfire has started in your throat.

You realize you can’t feel your hands. When you raise them, you realise you can see right through your fingers. They’ve turned into a semi-transparent purple smoke-like gas. The change spreads up your arms. As your body morphs you seem to constantly switch between a solid and gaseous form. When the transformation reaches your genitals, you look on with disappointment as they fade away into the smoke.

When your whole body has turned to smoke, you worry you’ll never be able to smell any lovely scents again. Everett brings you comfort by coming over with a vial of his musk. He uncorks it, saying, “Don’t worry, hun. Now that you’re made of smoke, you can absorb smells!” Sure enough, his musk blends in with your smoky form and your body reeks of skunk scent. You embrace Everett as best you can. He breathes your smoke in deeply, happy to smell his own musk.
x3.descriptionchange: This adventurer is a humanoid-shaped creature made of smoke, constantly shifting between gaseous and more solid forms.

npcs.name: Everett
npcs.description: Everett is a fairly young, strong skunk with a long, striped tail. His emerald eyes study your every move with keen interest.

dialogue.output: “I make a humble living selling perfumes. I used to travel quite a bit, but I’ve made enough to finally settle down. For the right price I can provide you with any scent you desire.”

“Gehehe… for a loyal customer like yourself, of course!” He unbuckles his belt and with one hand reaches in and pulls out his large, black cock. He lets you lean in and sniff it before putting it back in his pants.

“You sure can!” He raises his leg and rests a paw on the counter. You press your nose against his soft pads and inhale. It smells even sweeter than the perfumes on sale. After a couple minutes he lightly pushes you away. “Hurts my legs to maintain a position like that, but afterhours, you can smell ‘em as long as you like.”
“Any time, hun, any time. Just say the word!”
